channel.title: Need a banner for my bf3 server
channel.description:
If you would be so kind to make me a bf3 banner for my server on xbox 360, I'll be your best friend.
Requirements: Must be 512px x 128px Must be of type JPEG File size is under 500kB
A little info about the server: -my gamer tag is "marc is boss" (So you could say somewhere on it like the owner is marc is boss) -The server is 24/7 Rush Only
Otherwise just make a logo you think looks good or just put some hot girls in the bg with info of the server on top. Or another idea is just some battlefield stuff in the bg, but you can seriously make the logo however you want because you have doing me a huge favor making this.
Thanks in advance to whoever makes one for me!

item.title: Need a banner for my bf3 server
item.dc:creator: @ollie123 Ollie123
item.description:
@ollie123 wrote:

whattehp406:

Nice, placing the girls of red alert 3 on a battelfield 3 server ad.

I thought the one with the gun would fit with the theme of war, but marcbob wanted me to change it and I couldn’t be asked to go and find another one, so I took another one from the girls of RA3.

Read full topic
item.source: Need a banner for my bf3 server

item.title: Need a banner for my bf3 server
item.dc:creator: @marcbob marcbob
item.description:
@marcbob wrote:

[quote=“ollie123, post:2, topic:441423”]This is my crappy attempt:

If you decide to use it and want anything changing, tell me and I will. You’ve probably found one by now though.[/quote]

That’s awesome and I’m for sure using!

Edit: I am using that one, but if you could I like how to girl on the right is in the war theme but she is also kinda scaring me so maybe replacing her :P. Also, My gt has no caps so maybe you could make that more clear.

I really do appreciate this!

Read full topic
